results.name: Azure Best Practices
results.description: Returns secure, production-grade Azure best practices. Call this before generating Azure SDK code.

results.name: Azure Extension Commands
results.description:
Extension commands for additional Azure tooling functionality. Includes operations for executing Azure CLI (az),
Azure Developer CLI (azd), and Azure Quick Review (azqr) commands directly from the MCP server to extend
capabilities beyond native Azure service operations.

results.name: Azure Resource Group Operations
results.description:
Resource group operations - Commands for listing and managing Azure resource groups in your subscriptions.
Includes operations for listing clusters, retrieving cluster configurations, and managing Kubernetes environments
in Azure.

results.name: Azure Subscription Operations
results.description:
Azure subscription operations - Commands for managing Azure App Configuration stores and key-value settings.
Includes operations for listing configuration stores, managing key-value pairs, setting labels, locking/unlocking
settings, and retrieving configuration data.

results.name: Azure Kubernetes Service Operations
results.description: Azure Kubernetes Service operations - Commands for managing Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster resources.

results.name: Azure App Configuration Operations
results.description: App Configuration operations - Commands for managing Azure App Configuration stores and key-value settings.

results.name: Azure Role-Based Access Control Operations
results.description:
Authorization operations - Commands for managing Azure Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) resources. Includes
operations for listing role assignments, managing permissions, and working with Azure security and access
management at various scopes.

results.name: Azure Datadog Operations
results.description:
Datadog operations - Commands for managing and monitoring Azure resources through Datadog integration. Includes
operations for listing Datadog monitors and retrieving information about monitored Azure resources and their
health status.

results.name: Azure Cosmos DB Operations
results.description: Cosmos DB operations - Cosmos DB operations - Commands for managing and querying Azure Cosmos DB resources. Includes operations for databases, containers, and document queries.

results.name: Azure Foundry Operations
results.description: Foundry service operations - Commands for listing and managing services and resources in AI Foundry.

results.name: Azure Managed Grafana Operations
results.description:
Grafana workspace operations - Commands for managing and accessing Azure Managed Grafana resources and monitoring
dashboards. Includes operations for listing Grafana workspaces and managing data visualization and monitoring
capabilities.

results.name: Azure Key Vault Operations
results.description: Key Vault operations - Commands for managing and accessing Azure Key Vault resources.

results.name: Azure Data Explorer Operations
results.description:
Kusto operations - Commands for managing and querying Azure Data Explorer (Kusto) resources. Includes operations
for listing clusters and databases, executing KQL queries, retrieving table schemas, and working with Kusto data
analytics workloads.

results.name: Azure Marketplace Operations
results.description: Marketplace operations - Commands for managing and accessing Azure Marketplace products and offers.

results.name: Azure Monitor Operations
results.description: Azure Monitor operations - Commands for querying and analyzing Azure Monitor logs and metrics.

results.name: Azure PostgreSQL Operations
results.description:
PostgreSQL operations - Commands for managing Azure Database for PostgreSQL Flexible Server resources. Includes
operations for listing servers and databases, executing SQL queries, managing table schemas, and configuring
server parameters.

results.name: Azure Redis Cache Operations
results.description:
Redis Cache operations - Commands for managing Azure Redis Cache and Azure Managed Redis resources. Includes
operations for listing cache instances, managing clusters and databases, configuring access policies, and working
with both traditional Redis Cache and Managed Redis services.

results.name: Azure Search Operations
results.description:
Search operations - Commands for managing Azure AI Search services and indexes. Includes operations for listing
search services, managing search indexes, querying indexed data, and describing index schemas and configurations.

results.name: Azure Service Bus Operations
results.description:
Service Bus operations - Commands for managing Azure Service Bus resources including queues, topics, and
subscriptions. Includes operations for managing message queues, topic subscriptions, and retrieving details about
Service Bus entities.

results.name: Azure SQL Operations
results.description:
Azure SQL operations - Commands for managing Azure SQL databases, servers, and elastic pools. Includes operations
for listing databases, configuring server settings, managing firewall rules, Entra ID administrators, and elastic
pool resources.

results.name: Azure Storage Operations
results.description:
Storage operations - Commands for managing and accessing Azure Storage resources. Includes operations for
containers, blobs, and tables.

results.name: Azure Workbooks Operations
results.description:
Workbooks operations - Commands for managing Azure Workbooks resources and interactive data visualization
dashboards. Includes operations for listing, creating, updating, and deleting workbooks, as well as managing
workbook configurations and content.

results.name: Azure Bicep Schema Operations
results.description:
Bicep schema operations - Commands for working with Azure Bicep Infrastructure as Code (IaC) generation and schema
management. Includes operations for retrieving Bicep schemas, templates, and resource definitions to support
infrastructure deployment automation.

results.name: Azure Virtual Desktop Operations
results.description:
Virtual Desktop operations - Commands for managing and accessing Azure Virtual Desktop resources. Includes
operations for hostpools, session hosts, and user sessions.

results.name: Azure Terraform Best Practices
results.description: Terraform best practices - Returns Terraform best practices for Azure. Call this before generating Terraform code for Azure Providers.

results.name: Azure Load Testing Operations
results.description:
Load Testing operations - Commands for managing Azure Load Testing resources, test configurations, and test runs.
Includes operations for creating and managing load test resources, configuring test scripts, executing performance
tests, and monitoring test results.
